solution_line_template: They need to rotate {total_rotations_needed} times because {goal_blocks} x {rotations_per_block} = <<{goal_blocks}*{rotations_per_block}={total_rotations_needed}>>{total_rotations_needed}
They need to rotate {rotations_remaining} more times because {total_rotations_needed} - {already_rotated} = <<{total_rotations_needed}-{already_rotated}={rotations_remaining}>>{rotations_remaining}
